name: Renee Miller
text: The pizza was so oily we couldn't finish it

name: Bob Rosensteel
text: Ordered a lava cake and one was obviously missing from the box. I called and the manager did not want to send the driver out to correct it. Insisted on a credit even after explaining we’re from out of town. Would NEVER recommend this location!!! Terrible customer service.

name: Robert Jahn
text: Ordered a 12 inch Pizza with thin crust sausage and mushrooms. Got the pizza home  and there was no sausage and it was not thin crust. Called back and the guy says will see what I can do. Never heard back.Very disappointed won’t go back!!!

name: Angela Hand
text: Best pizza I've had in awhile.  I have been ordering from another pizza brand, but decided I was in the mood for Dominos.  I ordered the Ultimate Pepperoni with extra cheese. They really DID extra cheese!  It came very quickly, and was very …More

name: John Jenkins
text: Delivery guy dropped my pizza and still gave it to me after a healthy tip. Called back they said they gave me store credit, when I called to redeem it. They had no history of it.

name: Jeff O
text: 30 minutes under a heat lamp is considered fresh at this location.

name: Tejpal Kapoor
text: Always wrong order .staff especially manager are very rude and unprofessional would not not recommend.

name: Ron Robinson
text: They don't close till 1 and been calling since 1215, somebody doesn't  want to work

name: Patrick Eikenberry
text: Terrible ordering process. Over 20 minutes in Quality Review. Had to call to see what they were doing.

name: Harlan Schadt
text: Great service with an obvious emphasis on customer satisfaction

name: Morgana Le Fey
text: The pizza I ordered was AMAZING! And the service was super fast and friendly!!! I just love the fact there’s a drive thru for pickup, it really made this dinner super easy! The pizza tracker was also spot on with my estimated ready by time! Overall I’d give it 6 stars if I could!

name: Ladonna Love
text: This is the worst pizza place ever! I will never order from them again I rather go to Pizza Hut! They messed up my order then wanted the pizza back I didn’t order it should have been for free! Then I talked to the manager and he act like he couldn’t give me anything free since they messed up my order! They really do suck!

name: Laurabeth Barber
text: They stop answering the phone 30-40 before they close for delivery. They will even hang up on you while u r on hold

name: bobbie vance
text: Food was great. they got everything right. But I wish you got more than 2 red pepper packs per pizza I use like 1 for 2 slice's other than that it was good

name: Michael Oziemkowski
text: Every order is always on time and perfect.

name: Helen Moorhead
text: The Domino’s pizza is great! They are fast and the pizza is awesome!  Thank you for delivering.

name: Tracy Fierro
text: Apparently contactless delivery is not contactless delivery when your driver asks you to sign the receipt with her pen and I said I would use my own pen because she’s already touched it and I’ve never been asked to sign a receipt the last …More

name: Blakelan Dawn
text: Good food & staff. This dominos doesn’t mess up our order every time like the Davenport location, it’s a little further for us than the Davenport one, but the service and accuracy makes it worth it. Only wish they delivered to our address (we’re not in their delivery zone which isn’t their fault).

name: Valerie Rockwell
text: Always fresh and hot!

name: Dylan Spray
text: Gretchen had best customer service ever 10/10 would recommend!

name: Rick L
text: I patronize Domino's on 18 St. In Bettendorf. Their food/pizza is very good, their prices are reasonable and their staff is extremely service oriented. They also have a handy, easy to use app.

name: Mary Corman
text: The pizza was delicious and I like that there was booths and tables to sit down and eat. I think more Domino's should be like the Bettendorf store.

name: J T
text: Always good and extremely fast.

name: Ladonna Crowdy
text: Really fast service and the pizza was still hot! I love the deals they offer and how fast the pizza was delivered! Will definitely buy from again! This is the best pizza place in Bettendorf!

name: Parch Tubbs
text: Always undercooked or has like three inches of no toppings/cheese/sauce around the edge

name: Kelli Emerson
text: Always fast, hot, and fresh!

name: Erin Orchard
text: Dining inside the store is not their forte. Three of us went there to dine-in last Friday around 6pm. The guy who took our order seemed royally confused and kept asking us for the same information. We got a 2-litre since we were going to …More

name: cameron fleming
text: Whoever worked on the night of September 8th. Top notch.  customer service and really appreciate everything

name: Joanne Palmgren
text: Love the great customer service and their veggie sandwich is the bomb!

name: John Lennon
text: A great new store very clean and bright it was very good not my favorite but it was very good great employees great neighborhood😃

name: Quad Cities Native
text: I frequently order pizza from here carry out style. They answer promptly and do a good job taking my order. Pizza is made right and always baked to perfection. They don't skimp on the toppings either.

name: Keith Warner
text: Very clean and courteous staff. But too quiet ... lol

name: Betsy Vanausdeln
text: It was ok

name: Courtney Paulson
text: I placed an order online and the tracker said it went out at 5:59. At 6:30, the tracker said it had been delivered when in fact it had not been. I called the store. The manager, Alex, tried telling me that the driver tried calling and …More

name: Gopalakrishnan Rajaram
text: Good taste

name: Sean Conner
text: Great service

name: Doris Tuftee

name: A B
text: This Domino's restuarant has a drive thru which is great for pick up of online orders.

name: Gray Bawden
text: I have ordered from this store fairly regularly.  They have always had my order correct and very quickly (I always pick up).  My only complaint is that "normal" amount of sauce has been way too light lately so I started ordering more sauce. …More

name: Andrew Eacker
text: I had Ordered online for one sandwhich. Took over an hour and a half to get to me, apparently the door was locked at the auto repair shop that I work at that is open from 730-3pm. I did Not see any driver pull up to my parking lot. They did …More

text: Dominos always comes to my house fresh and hot, love it!

text: In the Land of Toddlerdom, this is the best delivery option for Date Night at home after the kids are in bed.

name: Jeffrey Peters
text:
The pizza is incredible, delivered with a smile
, the sandwich for 5.99 , not so much.

name: bob ross
text: Mediocre food. Unattractive staff, but they got heart and a willingness to work hard so they got my 5 stars.

name: G-Money Rides
text: Got pizza late at night (1230am) and it was cold, sauce less and tasted bad. Called back the next day (they close at 100am) and asked for a refund and was told "We don't do that" Well I guess that was my one and only order from that or any …More

name: Leslie Morlandt
text: Fast prep, great food excellent service!!

name: Monica Foley
text: Thank you for offering the gluten free option. Your delivery is always quick and my orders are accurate. The app for ordering is very easy to use.

name: Michael Pyron
text: Great food made right.. Great drivers and staff

name: Travis Nunn
text: I like the new location setup. The drive thru window is a plus.

text:
I always order pizza with extra cheese and extra garlic-parmesan sauce.
And earlier they used to give the extra (it used to be so yummy that I had got addicted to that ) but for last 5-6 months they are putting only normal and …More

name: Kevin Dominque
text: Good food quick service/delivery.

name: Heidi Massey
text: Rain pouring down, got home from work late -- ordered 2 pizzas and a Domino sandwich.  Great price, speedy delivery, arrived hot and tasted excellent!  Great job Domino's Staff!!!

name: Chris Voth
text: I arrived at 7:28, but received my order at 7:41 (20 minutes after it was marked ready for pickup). The employee told me that they had just put the pizza in the oven because they ran out of mushrooms. He said that he had called, but I did …More

name: KayJ Kayj
text: Was good before but now the short people extra toppings they pay for and take nearly 50 to give u a lookwarm people I had to feed my kids neverrrrrrr eatttttingggggg everrrrrr againnnnn!!!!!

text: To whom it may concern I placed an online order completed @442 advised 12-15 minutes as the order was being picked up I walked in @about 5:01 once in the restaurant was advised 10-12 more minutes none the less got my order a little guy …More

name: Shawna Renee'
text: I ordered a 3 topping pizza 1/2 with cheese and cheese and cheese and 1/2 with sausage and mushroom and cheese. With extra sauce. That definitely is NOT what I received. I called and Deb was rude and unapologetic . There is no excuse for terrible customer service or for a pizza to not be done correctly. They were not busy.

name: Ronnie Moore
text: Forgot my jalapenos but called and offered a free appetizer the next time I order

name: Rob Carrasco
text: Gave me one price over the phone for a large order and charged higher price when i went to pick it up. When i asked about the price discrepancy he said " I don't know what to tell you, bud, that's the price." Won't be back.

name: Elisabeth Clark-Zack
text: It is delicious and was well made. Got to the house quite quickly and I thank them.

name: Carol Chouteau
text: I haven't had a bad experience yet! Very friendly delivery people, prompt and courteous! Great food!

name: John89
text: Service good pizza made fast but this domino's goes very very lite on toppings here. Don't bother asking for extra cheese or playing for an extra as you won't get it.

name: Vanessa Escobar
text: I ordered 2 sandwiches and a medium pizza for delivery and asked if we could have pepper flakes and paper plates and napkins if they had any (since we are on vacation and staying at a hotel) which the person who took our order said “yes” …More

text: Dominos pizza always delivers excellent food that is hot and we'll prepared and is quickly delivered by a courteous, well groomed driver.
